code: import{createStore}from'redux';const counterReducer=function(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{counter:0};let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case'increment':return{counter:state.counter+1};case'decrement':return{counter:state.counter-1};case'amount':return{counter:state.counter+5};default:return state;}};const store=createStore(counterReducer);export default store;
